aheadColor.comment: The color to fill in the block when ahead of schedule, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
behindColor.comment: The color to draw the grid for a block when its not yet mined and was expected to be, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
gridColor.comment: The base color of the grid representing each block during the difficulty period, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
minedColor.comment: The color to fill in the block when it has been mined by the time expected, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
saveEachBlockEnabled.comment: Indicates whether the result for each block should be saved as a separate image. Useful as source for animated composites
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
